name: Police Patrol City: Crime Nigh
description:
Police Patrol City: Crime Night is a mafia game of city gangsters and Miami criminals who are scaring the city. you have to be a clever thug for fighting against other mafia criminals.
Features:
- Challenging gameplay
- Breathtaking 3D prison environment
- Top-notch sound effects
- Thrilling missions
- Stealth action mechanism.
